text: "Do It Again" is a 1984 song by British band The Kinks and is the opening track to their 21st album Word of Mouth. It went to number 41 in the United States and number 91 in Canada. It was released as a single in the United Kingdom and North America. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Power pop songs Category:The Kinks songs
title: Do It Again (The Kinks song)
